Name: Shift
About the game: It's a fun puzzle game. You have to connect as many figures as possible together. Use yellow 'shifters' to change direction of the line. Get more points for longer line. - Different modes (Ranking levels, Randomly generated levels) - Different elements (Blank, Connectors, Shifters, Locked Shifters, Bonus connectors) - Different difficulty levels (Grids: 7x7, 9x9, 11x11, 13x13) - Great soundtrack
Meta Title: Shift: Aug 16, 2016, Black Lime Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shift? Check out the release date (Aug 16, 2016), developer insights from Black Lime Studio, and a complete game summary.
